Name: AccountCurrencyCode
Notes: The currency of the Customer account.

Name: AccountDescriptiveName
Notes: The descriptive name of the Customer account.

Name: AccountTimeZone
Notes: Name of the timezone selected for the Customer account. For example: "(GMT-05:00) Eastern Time". This field does not reflect the current state of daylight saving time for the timezone.

Name: BaseCampaignId
Notes: The ID of base campaign of trial campaigns. For regular campaigns, this is equal to CampaignId.

Name: CampaignStatus
Enum Values:
UNKNOWN / unknown
ENABLED / enabled
PAUSED / paused
REMOVED / removed

Name: Criteria
Notes: Descriptive string for the Criterion. For more information on the format of criteria types in reports, see the Criteria prefixes section of the reporting guide.

Name: CriteriaType
Enum Values:
CONTENT_LABEL / Content Label
KEYWORD / Keyword
PLACEMENT / Placement
VERTICAL / Vertical
USER_LIST / User List
USER_INTEREST / User Interest
MOBILE_APPLICATION / Mobile Application
MOBILE_APP_CATEGORY / Mobile App Category
PRODUCT_PARTITION / Product Partition
IP_BLOCK / IP Block
WEBPAGE / Webpage
LANGUAGE / Language
LOCATION / Location
AGE_RANGE / Age
CARRIER / Carrier
OPERATING_SYSTEM_VERSION / Operating System Version
MOBILE_DEVICE / Mobile Device
GENDER / Gender
PARENT / Parental status
PROXIMITY / Proximity
PLATFORM / Platform
PREFERRED_CONTENT / Preferred Content
AD_SCHEDULE / Ad Schedule
LOCATION_GROUPS / Location Groups
PRODUCT_SCOPE / Product Scope
RUN_OF_NETWORK / Run of network
CUSTOM_AFFINITY / Custom Affinity
CUSTOM_IN_MARKET / Custom In-Market
YOUTUBE_VIDEO / YouTube Video
YOUTUBE_CHANNEL / YouTube Channel
APP_PAYMENT_MODEL / App Payment Model
INCOME_RANGE / Household income
INTERACTION_TYPE / Interaction type
UNKNOWN / unknown

Name: CustomerDescriptiveName
Notes: The descriptive name of the Customer.

Name: Id
Notes: ID of the main object of this row.

Name: IsNegative
Notes: Indicates if the criterion for this row is a negative (exclusion) criterion.
